name: Ana Tripunoska
description:
A passionate frontend engineer dedicated to crafting immersive digital experiences that blend creativity with cutting-edge technology. With a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I specialize in translating design concepts into pixel-perfect, interactive interfaces that captivate users and drive engagement.

From responsive web applications to dynamic single-page applications (SPAs), I thrive on the challenge of bringing ideas to life in the digital realm. 

Let's connect and explore how we can collaborate to build exceptional digital experiences that leave a lasting impression.

projects.projectName: REST Countries API with theme switcher
projects.projectDescription: Web application that shows all the countries from an API, allows filtering by region and separate details page for a selected country
Web application that filters job listings based on selected categories
Simple web app that displays different advices using API calls
Landing web page for an insurance company that has an optimal layout for the site depending on device's screen size
Landing web page for an insurance company that has an optimal layout for the site depending on device's screen size using TailwindCSS

bullet_points: Implementing user interface components for web site solutions built with Adobe Experience Manager
Interpreting designs and translating them into pixel-perfect HTML/SCSS/JSX output to create engaging, modern web experiences.
Ensuring high-performance and compatibility across mobile and desktop browsers using responsive design
Developing and testing user-facing features that leverage Vanilla JS, React, TypeScript
Performing bug fixes and code reviews
Working with experience designers and developers through the stages of design, development, QA, launch, and maintenance.
Collaborating with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability
Optimizing sites to improve performance and efficiency
Writing functional required documents and guides
Creating CSS files for websites and assist web developers in effective implementation
Writing SQL queries to insert, modify and delete data in database
